text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya ami tomalokaka phira'a'unara bansara paraa raksa karaichilo. Sihamte tomalokaka bara kathina sasti dichila. Tomalokara putra santanaka hatya karaichila arau kan'yasantanaka jiya'i raakhichila. Arau iyata achila tomalokara babe tomalokara pratipalakara paraa eka mahaparaiksa
